info.author: Christian Scholz
classifiers: Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
Introduction
============

This is an XRD parser for pydataportability. For more information
check out http://pydataportability.net

For an example you might look at pydataportability.discovery which you can also
find on PyPI.


Contributors
============

Christian Scholz, COM.lounge GmbH, cs@comlounge.net, http://mrtopf.de/blog

* Initial release
